attributes.action: not tax 4x4s needed in the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a family that live in the country in the middle of no where down a lane that is NEVER gritted it is vital we have a 4x4 to enable us to get out, the children to school and get to work. Why can't the government tax the 4x4 cars used in the town that are not needed instead of once again hammering us in the country. We already pay huge amounts of council tax for services that are not as good as in the towns plus we have to cover more mileage to get to work and school so the rise in petrol and diesel costs are high enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
